title: Lesser Healing Potion
summaries: The Lesser Healing Potion is a healing item that restores 50 health and inflicts Potion Sickness for 60 seconds when used. This duration can be reduced via the Philosopher's Stone or Charm of Myths. As its name suggests, it heals the least amount of health of all Healing Potions.

In addition to being crafted, Lesser Healing Potions can also be found naturally in <linked>pots</linked> (only before <linked>Hardmode</linked>), generated <linked>chests</linked>, <linked>Wooden</linked> and <linked>Pearlwood Crates</linked>, and dropped by most pre-Hardmode <linked>bosses</linked>.

Lesser Healing Potions can also be purchased for 3 SC from the Merchant, or from the Skeleton Merchant(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) during moon phases 2, 4, 6, and 8: [img:Moon phase 2 (Waning Gibbous)] [img:Moon phase 4 (Waning Crescent)] [img:Moon phase 6 (Waxing Crescent)] [img:Moon phase 8 (Waxing Gibbous)]

Naturally-placed Lesser Healing Potions appear frequently on <linked>platforms</linked> in the <linked>Dungeon</linked> (along with <linked>Lesser Mana Potions</linked>). When encountered in placed form, they function as <linked>Placed Bottle</linked> <linked>crafting stations</linked>. They also show the "bottle" <linked>tooltip</linked> on the <linked>map</linked>. They can be freed with a <linked>pickaxe</linked> or <linked>drill</linked> and retrieved, but they cannot be placed by the <linked>player</linked>.
